name: Deutsche Effecten- und Wechsel-Beteiligungsgesellschaft
overview:
As a listed private equity company DEWB provides support for strong growth, medium capitalized technology companies in the form of equity capital, expertise in corporate development and its sector network. The focus of the investment, which concentrates on the German-speaking countries (D / A / CH), lies in the areas of photonics and sensor systems which offer promising prospects for the future. Investors in the DEWB share gain access to the significant potential for added value offered by these key technologies of the 21st Century: Discover the light.

Since 1997 we have invested over 350 million Euros in 55 companies and realized more than 420 million Euros through 36 exits, eight of which were IPOs. DEWBâ€™s current investment portfolio covers 11 companies with a total value of 36 million Euros from the areas of photonics and sensor systems, as well as biotechnology and IT.

funding_round.source_description: Nanda Technologies raises 4m USD in a financing round led by Capital-E and KfW
